Your browser doesn't support HTML5 canvas.

Rules

You create defenders by clicking the playing field above the green line that represents your home. Each defender you click will have a strength represented by a color. The further away from the breach at the top of the playing field, the stronger your defender. Each attacker they take out will decrease their defense by one. You will se the color change. If the defender makes it through the breach, you gain points and health. You lose health for each defender you create. If an attacker hits your home base you die. You will then see your high score.
